dmca.title: Subpoena Report
dmca.body: I just found out yesterday that there was a subpoena in my name or that I was being sued by the MPAA for downloading two movies, Constantine and Punisher. I have no idea what these people are talking about, no one in my family has downloaded any movies, I dont' even know who to contact to find out any information and have been told by the media that I could do five years in jail or pay up to 300,000 in fines.. Is there anyone who can help me out
